sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const testimonials = [ { quote: "John is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are impressive. He took our vague concept and turned it into a beautiful, functional website that exceeded our expectations.", name: "Sarah Johnson", title: "CEO, TechStart Inc.", img: "https://readdy.ai/api/search-image?query=Professional%20headshot%20of%20a%20female%20CEO%20with%20short%20blonde%20hair%2C%20confident%20expression%2C%20business%20attire%2C%20neutral%20background%2C%20high%20quality%20portrait%20photography%20with%20soft%20lighting%2C%208k%20resolution&width=100&height=100&seq=9&orientation=squarish" }, { quote: "Working with John was a game-changer for our project. He not only delivered excellent code but also provided valuable insights that improved our overall product. His communication was clear and timely throughout the entire process.", name: "David Chen", title: "Product Manager, Innovate Solutions", img: "https://readdy.ai/api/search-image?query=Professional%20headshot%20of%20an%20Asian%20male%20product%20manager%20with%20glasses%2C%20friendly%20smile%2C%20casual%20business%20attire%2C%20neutral%20background%2C%20high%20quality%20portrait%20photography%20with%20soft%20lighting%2C%208k%20resolution&width=100&height=100&seq=10&orientation=squarish" }, { quote: "I've worked with many developers over the years, but John stands out for his technical expertise and creativity. He approaches each project with enthusiasm and delivers solutions that are both elegant and efficient. A true professional!", name: "Michelle Williams", title: "Marketing Director, Global Reach", img: "https://readdy.ai/api/search-image?query=Professional%20headshot%20of%20an%20African%20American%20female%20marketing%20director%20with%20natural%20hair%2C%20professional%20smile%2C%20modern%20business%20attire%2C%20neutral%20background%2C%20high%20quality%20portrait%20photography%20with%20soft%20lighting%2C%208k%20resolution&width=100&height=100&seq=11&orientation=squarish" } ]; const TestimonialsSection = () => (

Testimonials

What my clients and colleagues have to say about working with me.

{testimonials.map((t, i) => (

"{t.quote}"

{t.name}

{t.title}

))}
); export default TestimonialsSection;
